box_hunt.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

hunter_description.description: Armed with bow and arrow, the Hunter provides your town with game, pelts and other resources by tracking and killing wild animals.

hunting_perk.name: Call of the Hunter
hunting_perk.description:
While still able to place and check traps in trapping zones, the Hunter will also go after designated targets and actively track down wildlife, providing occasional game to be spotted.

Targets can be designated with the Hunt command under the Harvest menu.

tracking_1_perk.name: Apprentice Tracker
tracking_1_perk.description: The Hunter is able to track down small animals like squirrels or rabbits.

tracking_2_perk.name: Journeyman Tracker
tracking_2_perk.description: The Hunter is able to track down medium animals like foxes or deer.

camping_perk.name: Camping
camping_perk.description:
Hunting Camps can be crafted by the Weaver and placed anywhere on the world.

Whenever wild animals spawn near a Hunting Camp, they will be automatically marked for hunting.

tracking_3_perk.name: Master Tracker & Poaching
tracking_3_perk.description:
The Hunter is able to track down - and hunt - pretty much any kind of animal, even large predators.

Their exceptional tracking skills also allow them to occasionally go on special hunting trips outside of your own territory.

clean_shot_1_perk.name: Clean Kill (Rank 1)
clean_shot_1_perk.description: The Hunter has increased damage and range, making sure that the animal can be killed with less effort.

clean_shot_2_perk.name: Clean Kill (Rank 2)
clean_shot_2_perk.description: The Hunter has the best damage and range, swiftly finishing off most animals with no suffering or effort.

dog_companion_perk.name: Dog Companion
dog_companion_perk.description:
The Hunter acquires a loyal companion that will assist them during their hunts.

Dog companions will chase prey and - although they have a small damage output - they are very fast and will slow down their targets.

While hunting alongside their dog companion, all the resources dropped by the killed animals will be automatically moved to a Hunting Camp if available.

hunting_bow_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Hunter.
hunting_bow_recipe.flavor: A simpler bow that can be more easily handled. Good enough for wild animals

hunting_bow_recipe.description: Required to promote the Trapper into a Hunter.
hunting_bow_recipe.flavor: A simpler bow that can be more easily handled. Good enough for wild animals

hunting_bow.description: Simpler bow used for hunting wildlife.

talisman.description: Required to promote a Trapper to a Hunter.

hunting_camp.description: Automatically marks nearby tracked animals to be hunted. Used as a storage by Level 6 Hunters.

journeyman_hat.description: Provides the Hunter with some extra attributes when worn.
